backend/main.mo: Main chat canister implementing room creation, message posting/editing, message retrieval, reactions, and nickname tracking with blob storage mixin and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that resets message lists during upgrade while preserving rooms, nicknames, and message ID counter.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting redeploy process verification files, components, and associated requirement.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/REDEPLOY.md: Runbook describing the redeploy process and backend migration that clears and fixes message storage.
frontend/scripts/redeploy-verify.sh: Verification script that checks backend/frontend canister status and runs a basic backend query after redeploy.
frontend/scripts/redeploy.sh: Automated redeploy script rebuilding, upgrading, and deploying backend and frontend canisters.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling theme, routing between lobby and room views, and URL hash-based room navigation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme selector using a dropdown to switch between light, dark, and system modes.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: Message input component supporting text, file attachments, uploads, and reply handling.
Renders a chat message with editing, deletion, reactions, media handling, and reply display.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/useAtta: Hook that caches and manages object URLs for media attachments with cleanup.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/useIdle: Hook tracking user activity and detecting idle state based on a timeout.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Emoji reaction UI allowing users to react to messages and view counts.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Main chat room view handling message loading, scrolling, activity tracking, and reply logic.
frontend/src/features/chat/types/chatMes: Extended message types adding optimistic update metadata and helpers.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/attachm: Cache for attachment metadata keyed by fingerprint with size limits.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/detectM: Lightweight MIME detection using magic numbers from byte headers.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/display: Utility to determine a safe display name for message senders.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/downloa: Provides helpers to download files from URLs or byte arrays and derive file extensions from MIME types.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/mediaFi: Generates a lightweight string fingerprint for media bytes using length and boundary bytes.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/message: Compares two ChatMessage objects for structural equality using stable fields and media fingerprints.
Extracts user-friendly error messages from backend or network errors with fallbacks.
Defines stable sorting and merging logic for chat messages based on timestamps and IDs.
Checks whether messages are within the last hour and filters recent messages.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/polling: Chooses polling intervals based on tab visibility, user activity, and scroll position.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/scrollV: Provides helpers to access, scroll, and inspect the chat viewport element.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/structu: Reuses old message objects when unchanged to reduce React re-renders.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline nickname editor with validation, keyboard handling, and save/cancel/clear actions.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Lobby UI for setting nickname, creating rooms, and joining rooms with backend validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages a locally stored userId and nickname using localStorage with automatic initialization and updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageVisibility.ts: Tracks and returns whether the document is currently visible using the visibilitychange event.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend rooms and messages, including listing, validating, creating rooms, fetching messages, and posting messages with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRafThrottledCallba: Creates a callback throttled to one execution per animation frame using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive CSS variables for themes, chat bubbles, and utility classes for color theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, theme extensions, dark mode, plugins, and CSS variableâ€“based design tokens.
project_state.json: Project state file describing versions, issues, and feature requests, including a pending backend runtime error fix.
